Race.SpecificTitle: School District No. 1 -- 10.66 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
School District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  Renewal of a 10.66 mills tax for a period of 10 years for the purpose of providing funds for public school building maintenance, improvement, equipment, materials and supplies in School District No. 1 of the Parish of Jefferson Davis.
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 1 of the Parish of Jefferson Davis, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a special tax of ten and sixty-six hundredths (10.66) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $220,000 is reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of providing funds for public school building maintenance, improvement, equipment, materials and supplies in the District?
